root.info: Interface preferences for the Siren redescription mining tool.

parameter.name: workserver_ip
parameter.label: Workserver IP
parameter.legend: IP adress of the server executing computational the tasks or local for local computations.

parameter.name: workserver_port
parameter.label: Workserver Port
parameter.legend: Listening port of the server executing the computational tasks.

parameter.name: workserver_authkey
parameter.label: Workserver Key
parameter.legend: Authentification key on the server executing the computational tasks.

parameter.name: workserver_client
parameter.label: Client Id
parameter.legend: Client ID to reconnect on the server.

parameter.name: nb_folds
parameter.label: Nb folds
parameter.legend: Number of parts the data should be split into.

parameter.name: coo_dim
parameter.label: Strips direction
parameter.legend: Coordinate to cut the strips along (-1 and -2 for cut along longitudes and latitudes, respectively).

parameter.name: grain
parameter.label: Granularity
parameter.legend: Granularity of the cut (lower means narrower strips).
